titles.title: Buried? Yes, But It Is Seed (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Burried? Yes but it is seed From which continents may feed Millions yet may bless the day When that seed was laid away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Buried - Hidden - Out of sight Dwelling in the deepest night Losing underneath the sod Everything except God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Buried - unremembered - lost So thinks man But all the cost God has counted to display Life abundant one glad day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Art thou buried? God's pure seed Doth thy heart in silence bleed Change thy sighing into song Thus alone can harvests come{/lang-eng}
